cards.title: Consistent & Compliant
cards.text: DB UI Core is based on the DB UX Design System, that are the guidelines for any Personenverkehr Customer and Deutsche Bahn Enterprise website and web applications.

cards.title: Accessible
cards.text: DB UI Core leverages semantic HTML, ARIA roles, states and properties to apply our styles wherever possible, thus enforcing correct, accessible markup. And we're quality checking this in partnership with the Team Digital Accessibility

cards.title: Declarative
cards.text: DB UI Core uses declarative selectors instead of visual helpers to ensure our HTML class names and structure are human read- and understandable, lean, performant and so much easier to update.

cards.title: Decoupled
cards.text: DB UI Core is decoupled from the JavaScript layer, to implement the patterns in any Web Development technology context; and we're providing universal Web Components and native JS framework components with DB UI Elements as well.

cards.title: Evergreen
cards.text: As DB UX Design System evolves, so does DB UI Core, meaning apps only need to keep their DB UI Core package updated to ensure the latest look and feel.

cards.title: Community driven
cards.text: A platform providing the space and technology for a common basis of curated components; their development is mainly driven by the community, adapted out of the work done in projects and through the huge amount of feedback.
